flawed_nl_solution:
Nora has saved 5*6 = <<5*6=30>>30 dollars
This means that Tamara has saved 30/3 = <<30/3=10>>10 dollars
All together, they have saved 30 + 10 + 6 = <<30+10+6=64>>64 dollars
If they pay off the debt they will remain with 64 - 40 = <<64-40=24>>24 dollars
Dividing the remaining money equally will give each girl 24/3 = <<24/3=8>>8 dollars.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 64. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
